name: sms
daemonNote: TrollStore Root privileges are required to access the system SMS database.

methods.name: tryAccess
methods.description: Attempt direct access to the SMS database (for debugging)
methods.returnsDescription: Whether the access attempt was successful

methods.name: read

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve (defaults to 10)

methods.returns: [{ id: string, content: string, sender: string, date: number }]

methods.name: getVerificationCode
methods.description: Extract a verification code from recent messages

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Time window in minutes to search for a code (defaults to 5)

methods.returnsDescription: The extracted code or null if not found

methods.name: search
methods.returns: [{ id: string, content: string, sender: string, date: number }]
methods.returnsDescription: An array of matching message objects

methods.name: getByAddress
methods.description: Retrieve messages from a specific phone number
methods.returns: [{ id: string, content: string, sender: string, date: number }]

methods.name: getChats
methods.description: Retrieve a list of conversation threads
methods.returns: [{ id: string, name: string, lastMessage: string, date: number }]
methods.returnsDescription: An array of chat session objects

methods.name: getStatistics
methods.returns: { total: number, unread: number, senders: number }

methods.name: getLatest
methods.returns: { id: string, content: string, sender: string, date: number } | null
methods.returnsDescription: The latest message object or null

methods.name: getUnread
methods.returns: [{ id: string, content: string, sender: string, date: number }]
methods.returnsDescription: An array of unread message objects
